Package game

Class Window

java.lang.Object
game.Window
Direct Known Subclasses:
Application
public abstract class Window extends Object
Low-level abstraction, which creates application window and starts the main loop. It's recommended to use Application, but this class could be extended directly as well. When extended, life-cycle methods should be called manually.

  • Method Details

    • init

      protected void init(Configuration config)
      Method to initialize application.
      Parameters:
      config - configuration object with basic window information

    • dispose

      protected void dispose()
      Method to dispose all used application resources and destroy its window.

    • initWindow

      protected void initWindow(Configuration config)
      Method to create and initialize GLFW window.
      Parameters:
      config - configuration object with basic window information

    • initImGui

      protected void initImGui(Configuration config)
      Method to initialize Dear ImGui context. Could be overridden to do custom Dear ImGui setup before application start.
      Parameters:
      config - configuration object with basic window information

    • preProcess

      protected void preProcess()
      Method called every frame, before calling process() method.

    • postProcess

      protected void postProcess()
      Method called every frame, after calling process() method.

    • run

      protected void run()
      Main application loop.

    • runFrame

      protected void runFrame()
      Method used to run the next frame.

    • process

      public abstract void process()
      Method to be overridden by user to provide main application logic.

    • startFrame

      protected void startFrame()
      Method called at the beginning of the main cycle. It clears OpenGL buffer and starts an ImGui frame.

    • endFrame

      protected void endFrame()
      Method called in the end of the main cycle. It renders ImGui and swaps GLFW buffers to show an updated frame.

    • disposeImGui

      protected void disposeImGui()
      Method to destroy Dear ImGui context.

    • disposeWindow

      protected void disposeWindow()
      Method to destroy GLFW window.

    • getHandle

      public final long getHandle()
      Returns:
      pointer to the native GLFW window

    • getColorBg

      public final Color getColorBg()
      Returns:
      Color instance, which represents background color for the window

    • getFPS

      public final int getFPS()
